001import java.io.IOException;
002/** Asteroids.java - A clone of classic Atari arcade game Asteroids
003* 
004*       Algorithm:
005*        <ol>
006*               <li>Create gamecontroller with public scope to give all objects access</li>
007*               <li>Load images and highscore, exit if error occurs</li>
008*               <li>Create game main menu with start and exit options</li>
009*               <li>If player selects exit skip to </li>
010*               <li>If player selects start clear menu and make game window</li>
011*               <li>Create three starting asteroids in game</li>
012*               <li>Put player at middle of screen</li>
013*               <li>Player turns with left and right, moves with up, and shoots with space</li>
014*               <li>Check all bullets for collisions with asteroids, skip to step if none</li>
015*               <li>Destroy bullet and asteroid and increment score</li>
016*               <li>Check all bullets for collisions with player, skip to step if none</li>
017*               <li>Destroy bullet and player and decrement lives</li>
018*               <li>Check all asteroids for collisions with player, skip to step if none</li>
019*               <li>Destroy asteroid and player and decrement lives</li>
020*               <li>If player lives reach zero, display game over message and return to step 3, updating highscore if necessary</li>
021*               <li>If player lives above zero, return to step 9</li>
022*               <li>Save high scores and terminate program</li>
023*        </ol>
024* 
025* 
026* @author Daniel Andrews
027* @version Final Project
028*/
029public class Asteroids {
030        // Constants to set the game window width and height
031        public static final int CANVAS_WIDTH = 750,
032                                                        CANVAS_HEIGHT = 600;
033        // Object to control game flow, given public scope to allow access to
034        // all game objects
035        public static GameController gc;
036
037        public static void main(String[] args) {
038                // Instantiate new game controller
039                gc = new GameController();
040                try {
041                        gc.loadImages(); // Load game sprites
042                        gc.loadHighscore(); // Load highscore data
043                }
044                catch (IOException e) {
045                        // Indicate to user if error occurs in reading files and exit
046                        System.out.println("Error Loading Game Files: " + e.getMessage()); 
047                        System.exit(1);
048                }
049                
050                GameFrame gf = new GameFrame(); // Create game window
051                gc.addGameFrame(gf); // Pass game window to controller
052                gf.goToMenu(gc.getHighscore()); // Start at game menu
053
054        }
055}
